cause.description:
Just Foreign Policy is an independent and non-partisan membership organization.
We work with our supporters both online and offline to compel our leaders to develop better relations with fellow countries. We oppose wars of aggression and the promotion of a world that only benefits a minority.
1. US foreign policy must reflect the interests of all its citizens.
2. Cooperation, law and diplomacy are essential in foreign policy.
3. Violence and coercion are wrong and peaceful alternatives exist.
cause.mission: To reform U.S. foreign policy to serve the interests and reflect the values of the broad majority of Americans, rather than those of special interests both inside and outside of government.
cause.name: For a Just Foreign Policy
